name: The Disgusting Slaughterman
description:
Open world first person shooter
The Disgusting Slaughterman a fast paced fps shooter, starring the least possible saviour of the earth. A half naked and confused lad, full on steroids.
And his only superpower is his lack of morality combined with confusiones.
Fight hordes of evil monsters like unicorns, bigfoot, and even Santa Claus!
Explorer the world find the Mask what is best fitting for you ,grab your shotgun, get yourself a machete and lets rock!


• Experience a open world shooter adventure
• Find hidden places
• Find different weapons or even upgrade them
• Discover the world to find new places and useful items
• Fight against natural or supernatural dangers
• Play together up to 4 players

We were Inspired By
• Serious Sam
• Borderlands
and much more!

Thanks For such good and inspiring games <3!
